articles.author: Bradley Russell, Darren Scott
articles.title: Star Trek Discovery showrunner says that they will be following up a 30-year-old mystery that was never addressed: "You don't just let that go" - Gamesradar
articles.description: SFX talks to Star Trek Discovery showrunner Michelle Paradise about *that* TNG callback
articles.content: Star Trek Discovery may have gone far, far beyond any other point in the franchise’s timeline after its third season leap to the 32nd Century – but its final season is still finding time to address o… [+2569 chars]
